Man it must be hard being a noob so that you cant packup a few .zip and .rar files. All is in its order, no files are missing, none are corrupt. Im now starting the installer and no problems, program is installed.

Rars are packed in zips for scene related issues, no need for you to understand why they do it, just live with it. Its how its been done for years.

Never seen compression done quite so stupidly. Easiest way I found was to highlight all winrars and and click extract here to extract them all. Ignore all warnings and just wait till you get the .exe. 

Run it and enjoy.

Thanks to uploader even if your method of compression was a bit on the crazy side..
thx dude...

Really that simple.

Bothersome to acquire the actual .exe file, but worth it.

Clear directions to "create" the .exe:

Once all of the .zip files have been extracted, the following files need to be place in the same directory:

1. All files with the naming scheme "fo-p8s.r##" (where ## is 00 - 29).

2. The "fo-p8s.rar" file.

3. The "file_id.diz" file.

Once these (32) files are in the same directory, "creating" the .exe is a simple matter of opening "fo-p8s.rar" in IZArc/WinZip/7-Zip/etc. and extracting to a single directory.

This will create the file "fo-p8s.exe" which should be ~143MB.

Enjoy!
That's the way F.O.S.I. Releases are usually packaged.
